content: There's a planet made of diamonds twice the size of Earth! The planet, 55 Cancri e, is likely covered in graphite and diamond.
The blue whale's heart is so big that a human could swim through its arteries! The heart alone can weigh up to 1,000 pounds.
Your brain generates enough electricity to power a small LED light! It produces about 10-23 watts of power when you're awake.
Octopuses have three hearts and can change color to blend into their surroundings! This camouflage helps them avoid predators.
The first computer 'bug' was an actual insect! In 1947, engineers removed a moth from a malfunctioning computer.
Cleopatra’s needle, an obelisk in London, is over 3,500 years old! It was a gift from Egypt in 1819.
A single lightning bolt could power a small town for a day! It carries about 1 billion volts of electricity.
Honey never spoils! Archaeologists found edible honey in Egyptian tombs over 3,000 years old.
The Sun makes up 99.86% of the Solar System’s mass! Everything else is just a tiny fraction.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It involved a squid attack on a naval ship in 1838.
You shed about 30,000 to 40,000 dead skin cells every minute! That’s over 50 million a day.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'! They get their pink color from their diet.
The internet’s first email was sent in 1971! It was a simple test message between two computers.
The Great Wall of China is over 21,000 kilometers long! It’s visible from space under the right conditions.
The Amazon Rainforest produces 20% of the world’s oxygen! It’s often called the 'lungs of the Earth.'
Apples float in water because 25% of their volume is air! This makes them perfect for bobbing games.
A day on Venus is longer than its year! It takes 243 Earth days to rotate once.
The deepest part of the ocean is nearly 11 kilometers down! It’s called the Mariana Trench.
Your stomach acid could dissolve metal! It has a pH as low as 1.5.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins! They can stay underwater for up to 40 minutes.
The first computer mouse was made of wood! It was invented by Douglas Engelbart in 1964.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in 1896 in Zanzibar.
Mount Everest grows about 4mm every year! Tectonic plates keep pushing it upward.
Chocolate was once used as currency! The Aztecs traded cocoa beans for goods.
There’s a cloud of alcohol in space! It’s 1,000 times larger than our Solar System.
Sharks have an acute sense of smell! They can detect blood in the water from miles away.
Your nose can remember 50,000 different scents! It’s a powerful memory tool.
Penguins can jump up to 6 feet in the air! They use this to leap out of the water.
The first video game was created in 1958! It was called 'Tennis for Two.'
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It happened in 1896 in Zanzibar.
The Sahara Desert was once a lush forest! It transformed about 6,000 years ago.
Carrots were originally purple or yellow! Orange carrots were bred in the 16th century.
Saturn’s rings are made of ice and rock! They could disappear in 100 million years.
Jellyfish have no heart or brain! They’ve survived for over 500 million years.
Your bones are stronger than concrete! Ounce for ounce, they can bear more weight.
A cheetah can go from 0 to 60 mph in 3 seconds! It’s the fastest land animal.
The first smartphone was released in 1992! It was called the IBM Simon.
The Eiffel Tower was almost built in Barcelona! Paris won the bid in 1889.
A single tree can absorb 48 pounds of CO2 per year! It’s a natural air purifier.
Pineapples take two years to grow! They’re worth the wait for their sweet taste.
The Moon is drifting away from Earth! It moves about 3.8 cm farther each year.
Coral reefs are animals, not plants! They’re built by tiny creatures called polyps.
You have about 0.2 milligrams of gold in your body! Most of it is in your blood.
Elephants never forget! They have one of the best memories in the animal kingdom.
The first webcam watched a coffee pot! It was set up in 1991 at Cambridge University.
The pyramids were built with over 2 million stone blocks! Each weighs about 2.5 tons.
The shortest river in the world is 118 feet long! It’s the Roe River in Montana.
A single coffee plant produces 1 pound of coffee per year! It takes 5 years to mature.
A teaspoon of a neutron star weighs 6 billion tons! It’s incredibly dense.
The clownfish can change gender! If the female dies, a male takes her place.
Your tongue has 8,000 taste buds! They regenerate every two weeks.
Owls can rotate their heads 270 degrees! Their eyes don’t move, so their neck does the work.
The first hard drive held 5 MB of data! It was the size of a refrigerator in 1956.
The oldest known recipe is for beer! It dates back 5,000 years to Mesopotamia.
The largest flower in the world smells like rotting flesh! The corpse flower attracts flies for pollination.
Tomatoes were once thought to be poisonous! They were decorative plants in the 1500s.
There’s a volcano on Mars three times taller than Everest! Olympus Mons is 22 km high.
The sea cucumber can eject its organs to escape predators! They regrow them later.
Your body has enough iron to make a 3-inch nail! It’s mostly in your blood.
A hummingbird’s heart beats up to 1,260 times per minute! It’s the fastest of any bird.
The first website is still online! It was created by Tim Berners-Lee in 1991.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The largest desert isn’t sandy—it’s icy! Antarctica is classified as a cold desert.
Cucumbers can fight bad breath! A slice on your tongue freshens your mouth.
Jupiter’s Great Red Spot is a storm twice Earth’s size! It’s raged for over 300 years.
The mantis shrimp can punch with the force of a bullet! It’s one of the ocean’s strongest creatures.
You produce enough saliva to fill two swimming pools in your lifetime! That’s about 25,000 quarts.
A kangaroo can’t walk backward! Its legs are built for hopping forward.
The first CD could hold 74 minutes of music! It was designed to fit Beethoven’s 9th Symphony.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It took place in 1896 in Zanzibar.
The longest recorded earthquake lasted 10 minutes! It struck Indonesia in 2004.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t! Botanically, it’s all about the seeds.
The universe is expanding faster every day! It’s been stretching since the Big Bang.
The immortal jellyfish can revert to its juvenile form! It potentially lives forever.
Your fingernails grow faster than your toenails! They grow about 3.5 mm per month.
A group of crows is called a murder! They’re known for their intelligence.
The first Apple logo showed Isaac Newton! It was replaced with the bitten apple in 1977.
The first Olympic Games had only one event! It was a 192-meter footrace in 776 BC.
The hottest place on Earth hit 134°F! Death Valley holds the record from 1913.
Cheese is the most stolen food in the world! It’s swiped more than any other grocery item.
Black holes can ‘sing’! They emit low-frequency vibrations detected by scientists.
The giant squid has eyes the size of basketballs! They help it see in the deep ocean.
Your heart beats 100,000 times a day! That’s over 35 million times a year.
Bats are the only mammals that can fly! Their wings are made of thin skin.
The first TV remote was called 'Lazy Bones'! It was wired to the TV in 1950.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The fastest wind ever recorded was 253 mph! It hit Australia during a cyclone in 1996.
Watermelons are 92% water! They’re a refreshing fruit and vegetable combo.
The coldest place in the universe is -454°F! It’s in the Boomerang Nebula.
Dolphins sleep with one eye open! They rest half their brain at a time.
Your liver can regrow itself! It’s the only organ that can fully regenerate.
A snail can sleep for three years! It enters a deep hibernation state.
The first ATM dispensed cash in 1967! It was installed in London.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The deepest cave in the world is 7,208 feet deep! It’s Krubera Cave in Georgia.
Potatoes were the first food grown in space! They were cultivated in 1995.
The Milky Way has 200 billion stars! Our galaxy is just one of trillions.
The electric eel can generate 600 volts! It uses this to stun prey.
Your ears never stop growing! They get slightly larger as you age.
A giraffe’s tongue is 18 inches long! It’s purple and helps them grab leaves.
The first barcode was scanned in 1974! It was on a pack of gum.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It happened in Zanzibar in 1896.
The tallest tree in the world is 379 feet high! It’s a redwood named Hyperion.
Avocados are poisonous to birds! The pit and skin contain a toxin called persin.
Pluto was discovered in 1930! It’s smaller than Earth’s Moon.
The starfish can regrow its arms! Some species can even regrow a whole body.
You blink about 20 times a minute! That’s over 10 million times a year.
A lion’s roar can be heard 5 miles away! It’s one of the loudest animal sounds.
The first Google server was built with LEGO! It housed 10 hard drives in 1996.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
Pumpkins are 90% water! They’re technically a fruit, not a vegetable.
The Sun will eventually swallow Earth! In 5 billion years, it’ll expand into a red giant.
The anglerfish uses a glowing lure to catch prey! It lives in the deep sea.
Your blood vessels could circle the Earth twice! They stretch over 60,000 miles.
A camel can drink 30 gallons of water in 13 minutes! It’s built for desert life.
The first digital camera took 23 seconds to snap a photo! It was invented in 1975.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The loudest natural sound was a volcanic eruption! Krakatoa’s blast in 1883 was heard 3,000 miles away.
Peanuts aren’t nuts—they’re legumes! They grow underground like beans.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The octopus has a beak like a parrot! It’s the only hard part of its body.
Your body has more bacteria than human cells! They outnumber us 10 to 1.
A blue whale’s tongue weighs as much as an elephant! It’s about 5,000 pounds.
The first text message said 'Merry Christmas'! It was sent in 1992.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes! It occurred in Zanzibar in 1896.
The driest place on Earth hasn’t seen rain in 400 years! It’s the Atacama Desert.
Ketchup was sold as medicine in the 1830s! It was marketed as a cure for indigestion.
